title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Removed preview notes for EMU repo access feature, indicating it's now generally available.
Updated rate limit documentation: WebSockets rate limit now applies when primary limits are enabled, removed reference to `app.github.rate-limiting-enabled`.
Simplified billing access roles: clarified that organization/enterprise owners/billing managers can view usage data.
Updated OpenAPI schemas: fixed field ordering and revised Copilot code review descriptions from "Automatically request review" to "Request Copilot code review automatically".
summary:
- Removed preview notes for EMU repo access feature, indicating it's now generally available.
- Updated rate limit documentation: WebSockets rate limit now applies when primary limits are enabled, removed reference to `app.github.rate-limiting-enabled`.
- Simplified billing access roles: clarified that organization/enterprise owners/billing managers can view usage data.
- Updated OpenAPI schemas: fixed field ordering and revised Copilot code review descriptions from "Automatically request review" to "Request Copilot code review automatically".
generated_title: Update docs: EMU GA, rate limits, billing roles, and OpenAPI fixes

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Removed preview notes for EMU repo access feature, indicating it's now generally available.
- Updated rate limit documentation: WebSockets rate limit now applies when primary limits are enabled, removed reference to `app.github.rate-limiting-enabled`.
- Simplified billing access roles: clarified that organization/enterprise owners/billing managers can view usage data.
- Updated OpenAPI schemas: fixed field ordering and revised Copilot code review descriptions from "Automatically request review" to "Request Copilot code review automatically".

### Title
Update docs: EMU GA, rate limits, billing roles, and OpenAPI fixes
